pullRequest.title: Add timestamp and biddercode to event URL
pullRequest.bodyText: A round of updates on event reporting that relays to timestamp and biddercode items.

And toUrl method

nodes.bodyText: ... or creates if is is null

biddersToCacheBidIds.entrySet().stream()
                .filter(biddersAndBidIds -> biddersAndBidIds.getValue().contains(bidId))
                .findFirst()
                .map(Map.Entry::getKey)
                .ifPresent(bidder -> bidObjectNode.put("wurl", eventsService.winUrl(bid.getId(), bidder, accountId,
                        timestamp)));
The /vasttrack endpoint should support a 'timestamp' parameter, adding it to the video imp url as the 'ts' parameter
Replace anyLong() to any() if you want to test method invocation. And please, fix it in others tests
please check ALL (long)0 occurrences and change it to 0L

If you are using '/n' for first parameter, keep this style for the next.
FIX for others

Array is redundant.
And final is not needed (my mistake)

(don't you see that there are space missing ?)
